messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: I highly reccommend Adjusting your Suit Sensors to have the tracking beacons on. If you can't figure out how to do it, please ask your nearest crewmate with two brain cells to share one with you.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Alright guys we got reports of the simian flu so stay safe out there

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Our goal is to construct a DNA vault get on it

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: It appears comms are down switch to station baounced radios until the problem is fixed

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vacant Office B.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Earth Death-trap Victor, please stand-by.
